Key Match Events: India won by 7 wickets with 17 balls remaining.
Shreyas Iyer was named Player of the Match for his unbeaten 74 off 44 balls.
Pathum Nissanka scored 75 runs off 53 balls for Sri Lanka.
Dasun Shanaka scored 47 runs off 19 balls for Sri Lanka.
Ravindra Jadeja scored 45 runs off 18 balls for India.
Lahiru Kumara took 2 wickets for 31 runs for Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala.
India elected to field first after winning the toss.
